item.description: So, the Groggy Frog is in Southington, CT...and it has karaoke on Friday nights. I know we had all talked about going out this coming Saturday, but I was thinking on the way home that maybe staying local this weekend wouldn't be a bad idea (also realized I have a grad party to go to on Saturday and don't know how late it'll run...) The address is 129 Center St., Southington, CT 06489...we could even do dinner beforehand, at...wherever in Southington, if you guys wanted. Originally, we had said girls only, but for karaoke, it'd be cool to invite the guys too.  :)
item.name: Karaoke @ The Groggy Frog
